name: Unloc
introduce: Unloc is a customizable NFT-collateralized lending platform allows users to gain temporary liquidity by using NFT as collateral to borrow against. NFT owners create p2p offers that can be accepted by anyone who wants to earn interest on their assets (SOL or USDC). Repaying the borrowed amount with agreed interest in time unlocks the NFT for the original owner. In case of a repayment failure, the other party gains the right to the NFT.
